TESTIMONIALS

“We worked with Jackie and her team for a big event in Palm Desert, CA. (over 200 guests) and they are extremely professional and helpful. Her team communicated with me before the wedding since we had multiple bar set up and made sure we were prepared for before guests start arriving. Looking forward to working more events with the company ”

— MINT BARTENDING

“RNE is the best event planners company we’ve worked with so far. They are not just professional in organizing the event details, everyone is very high tone, with a positive attitude and energy that influences everyone at the party. For weddings, this is a blessing. For private party and event planning, they can bring a happy environment or atmosphere to the event. ”

— M SUSHI PRIVATE CATERING

“Right from the first phone call RNE made us feel like rockstars, but truly, the team were the real rockstars! I’m a checklist and to-do boxes type of person and thought planning an event would be well within my realm of capabilities. But I needed all my married friends’ advice, got myself a planner, and went with ROCKNEVENTS. Best. Decision. Ever. My guests raved about how everything was so detailed, beautiful, and seamless. It was an amazing investment on our end to work with ROCKNEVENTS.”

— VICKY C.

“Rock N’ Events planners stand for their name, incredible work, and passion for what they do. From the photographer’s perspective, it is essential to have excellent communication with the event planner to get the best results and make our clients happy. Rock N’ Events are always completely on top of it, and the wedding that we had in common ran so smoothly. The whole setting was just a feast for the eyes, and our client seemed to be beyond excited. So, if you are a bride or groom who is looking for a top-notch event planner who will give you the best experience and make your dream event to come through, I highly recommend Rock N’ Events to put into your list!”

— TOMAS SKARINGA PHOTOGRAPHY

“What made ROCKNEVENTS stand out for me, specifically with my initial call with Jenny, was the obvious passion her company had for producing - not just planning - events. It was clear that the goal is to make their client’s dream event come to life in a way that was true to the client and not whatever the newest trends on Pinterest were. They truly gave 5-star service. It was obvious they were working diligently behind the scenes to secure everything for us negotiate with vendors myself! There was never a question that went unanswered with the team.”

— APRIL A.
